QuestData.Title: Pressing the Advantage
QuestData.Description: It looks like most of the Twilight's Hammer has fallen back to regroup for another assault. Their most dedicated are staying behind to hold the line. This is our chance to whittle away at their leadership.$B$BRange out along the Scorched Plain and crush the Twilight Field Captains. We'll remove them from the equation!
QuestData.CompletionText: You've given our forces a second wind, $n. How goes the fight?
QuestData.RewardText: Terrific! Twilight's Hammer will no doubt try to re-take the mountain, but they'll have to do so without the leadership of those fat-for-brains thugs.
